title: broken mir, trivial loop with -Zvalidate-mir

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
### Code The code fails to pass `-Zvalidate-mir` ```Rust fn main() { for _ in &[0] {} } ``` ### Meta Repo is at c86039b33343de264d8b3b1a9e3591b10d5615e8 ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in Item(DefId(0:3 ~ main[317d]::main[0])) (input to phase Const) at bb13[0]: encountered `Assign` statement with incompatible types: left-hand side has type: ! right-hand side has type: () --> main.rs:2:2 | 2 | for _ in &[0] {} | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at src/librustc_mir/transform/validate.rs:140:36 error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in Item(DefId(0:3 ~ main[317d]::main[0])) (after CheckPackedRef in phase Const) at bb13[0]: encountered `Assign` statement with incompatible types: left-hand side has type: ! right-hand side has type: () --> main.rs:2:2 | 2 | for _ in &[0] {} | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at src/librustc_mir/transform/validate.rs:140:36 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:367:17 ```
Backtrace
